results.title: Erectile dysfunction as a possible important side effect of metformin: A case report.
results.text_hl: After 15 days, he became impotent again, confirming that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was the most likely cause of his @<m>DISEASE_Sexual_Infantilism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050035 @@@sexual problem@@@.

citations.NLM: Ngu MH, Zakaria R, Mohd Zulkifli M, Ab Rahman R. Erectile dysfunction as a possible important side effect of metformin: A case report. Malays Fam Physician. 2023;18():20. PMID: 37207247
citations.BibTeX: @article{37207247, title={Erectile dysfunction as a possible important side effect of metformin: A case report.}, author={Ngu MH and Zakaria R and Mohd Zulkifli M and Ab Rahman R}, journal={Malays Fam Physician}, volume={18}, pages={20}}

results.title: Hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal axis and sexual functioning in metformin-treated men after discontinuation of testosterone replacement therapy: A pilot study.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to determine whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ modulates the impact of discontinuation of @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@ therapy on hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal axis activity and @<m>DISEASE_Sexual_Infantilism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050035 @@@sexual function@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with low @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@ levels.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Kowalcze K, Okopień B. Hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal axis and sexual functioning in metformin-treated men after discontinuation of testosterone replacement therapy: A pilot study. J Clin Pharm Ther. 2021 Dec;46(6):1764-1775. PMID: 34490645
citations.BibTeX: @article{34490645, title={Hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal axis and sexual functioning in metformin-treated men after discontinuation of testosterone replacement therapy: A pilot study.}, author={Krysiak R and Kowalcze K and Okopień B}, journal={J Clin Pharm Ther}, volume={46}, number={6}, pages={1764-1775}}

results.title: Metformin mitigates impaired testicular lactate transport/utilisation and improves sexual behaviour in streptozotocin-induced diabetic rats.

results.title: Sexual Functioning and Depressive Symptoms in Women with Diabetes and Prediabetes Receiving Metformin Therapy: A Pilot Study.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Sexual_Infantilism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050035 @@@Sexual Functioning@@@ and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@Depressive Symptoms@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@Women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@Prediabetes@@@ Receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Therapy: A Pilot Study.
